label: 中原広俊
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1062-after 1131). Father-in-law to Fujiwara no Shigeaki. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (54), and Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (1). [藤原茂明、漢詩]
